description: Detects uses of a renamed legitimate createdump.exe LOLOBIN utility to dump process memory
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Command lines that use the same flags
name: Renamed CreateDump Utility Execution
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"FX_VER_INTERNALNAME_STR") OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-u\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-f\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*.dmp*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-\-full\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-\-name\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*.dmp*"))) AND (NOT process.executable.text:"*\\createdump.exe"))
